title: Favorite Player by Round + Michael Pittman Jr.
itunes:title: Favorite Player by Round + Michael Pittman Jr.
description:
Rhett Lewis and Lance Zierlein are in for DJ and Bucky with a week to go before the 2020 NFL Draft. To start off, the hosts discuss their ideal top two picks for each of the teams selecting in the top five (Bengals, Redskins, Lions, Giants, Dolphins) (2:50). Next, the guys go round-by-round selecting their favorite players who might be selected in each phase of the draft (32:20). Finally, the Lance interviews Michael Pittman Jr., a standout wide receiver out of USC that is expected to be selected late in the first round or early in the second (1:04:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
